problem.script: m=random.randrange(3,15,3) n=random.randrange(3,6,1) nm= n* m L=random.randrange(5,25,5)/10 R=random.randrange(1,4,1)/10 formula=2*3.14* math.sqrt(((1/3+ n)*( L* L)+1/2* n*( R* R))/(9.8* L*(1/2+ n)))
problem.p:
A rod of length $L m and mass $m kg is fixed to a disk of radius $R m and mass $nm kg. If the rod can freely rotate on the end opposite the disk, what is the period (in seconds) of the pendulum?
Use 3.14 for \(\pi\) and 9.8 m/s2 for the acceleration due to gravity.
